## UserInfo interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

User information for registration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface UserInfo 
```

## Remarks

Neither [username](./passquito-client-js.userinfo.username.md) nor [displayName](./passquito-client-js.userinfo.displayname.md) have to be unique. They are for display purposes only.
